events.message:
functional test: Add new -dustrelayfee=0 test case

This test would catch regressions where ephemeral
dust checks are being erroneously applied on outputs
that are not actually dust.

policy: Allow dust in transactions, spent in-mempool

Also known as Ephemeral Dust.

We try to ensure that dust is spent in blocks by requiring:
  - ephemeral dust tx is 0-fee
  - ephemeral dust tx only has one dust output
  - If the ephemeral dust transaction has a child,
    the dust is spent by by that child.

0-fee requirement means there is no incentive to mine
a transaction which doesn't have a child bringing its
own fees for the transaction package.
rpc: disallow in-mempool prioritisation of dusty tx
functional test: Add ephemeral dust tests

test: Add CheckMempoolEphemeralInvariants

Checks that transactions in mempool with dust
follow expected invariants.

fuzz: add ephemeral_package_eval harness

Works a bit harder to get ephemeral dust
transactions into the mempool.
test: unit test for CheckEphemeralSpends
Add release note for ephemeral dust
bench: Add basic CheckEphemeralSpends benchmark
CheckEphemeralSpends: only compute txid of tx when needed
Rename CheckValidEphemeralTx to PreCheckValidEphemeralTx
Have HasDust and PreCheckValidEphemeralTx take CTransaction
Use std::ranges for ephemeral policy checks
Implement GetDust to replace HasDust, use where appropriate
ephemeral policy: IWYU
ephemeral policy doxygen cleanup
bench: remove unnecessary CMTxn constructors

unit test: assert txid returned on CheckEphemeralSpends failures

Simplify nullopt checks
unit test: make dust index less magical
fuzz: remove dangling reference to GetEntry
fuzz: explain package eval coin tracking better
fuzz: Directly place transactions in vector
func: cleanup test_dustrelay comments
func: cleanup reorg test comment
fuzz: remove unused TransactionsDelta validation interface
fuzz: use optional status instead of should_rbf_eph_spend
fuzz: package_eval: move last_tx inside txn ctor
unit test: adapt to changing MAX_DUST_OUTPUTS_PER_TX
RPC: only enforce dust rules on priority when standardness active
func: slight elaboration on submitpackage restriction
func: rename test_free_relay to test_no_minrelay_fee
CheckEphemeralSpends: no need to iterate inputs if no parent dust
unit test: ephemeral_tests is using a dust relay rate, not minrelay
func: add note about lack of 1P1C propagation in tree submitpackage
